title: with the mage update and all, wb ahri
body: can we have something else instead of her w. as it is, its useless. mediocre , non reliable damage. i like playing ahri but it feels like, if u miss ur q, u have to wait for it to come back off cooldown, cus god knows ur w will only heal the enemy. they should buff it so it actually feels useful or just give her another spell in place. as the charming, seductive champ, maybe add a utility spell in place .

replies.body: Doesn't need to be replaced, it just needs better targeting.

Uh, maybe you should get better at Ahri. Her targetted damage is actually very important for her, it allows her to pressure an opponent without firing a skillshot, which in turn can force them to fight or flee, which makes it a lot easier to hit the skillshots. And it does do decent damage.

Plus, Ahri's plenty strong. Her mediocre W is a good example of power budgeting given her very strong Q. She does not need a buff.

her q is decent damage .-. not even on the stronger side.  and u cant control who ur w attacks in lane. half the time, at least 2 orbs hit minions. maybe she doesnt need buffs but regardless, her w does feel useless as a spell.
